darganfod - discover

cwmni - company

unigryw - unique

We have worked with our staff from @BBCRadioCymru and @BBCCymruFyw together with indepenent companies over the last two years to create a large number of unique podcasts in Welsh. There's a wealth of content now on @BBCSounds worth discovering.
